headline: T-Mobile Agrees to Sell $3.5 Billion of Senior Notes
summary: BELLEVUE, Wash., March 24, 2025--T-Mobile US, Inc. (NASDAQ: TMUS) ("T-Mobile") announced today that T-Mobile USA, Inc., its direct wholly-owned subsidiary ("T-Mobile USA" or the "Issuer"), has agreed to sell $1,250,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 5.125% Senior Notes due 2032 (the "2032 Notes"), $1,000,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 5.300% Senior Notes due 2035 (the "2035 Notes") and $1,250,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 5.875% Senior Notes due 2055 (the "2055 Note
